   19: 
   20: -module(escript_SUITE).
   21: -export([
   22: 	 all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 init_per_testcase/2,
   25: 	 end_per_testcase/2,
   26: 	 basic/1,
   27: 	 errors/1,
   28: 	 strange_name/1,
   29: 	 emulator_flags/1,
   30: 	 emulator_flags_no_shebang/1,
   31: 	 two_lines/1,
   32: 	 module_script/1,
   33: 	 beam_script/1,
   34: 	 archive_script/1,
   35: 	 archive_script_file_access/1,
   36: 	 epp/1,
   37: 	 create_and_extract/1,
   38: 	 foldl/1,
   39: 	 overflow/1,
   40: 	 verify_sections/4,
   41:          unicode/1,
   42:          bad_io_server/1,
   43:          bypass_unicode_conversion/1
   44: 	]).
   45: 
   46: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   47: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   48: 
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   52: 
   53: all() -> 
   54:     [basic, errors, strange_name, emulator_flags,
   55:      emulator_flags_no_shebang, two_lines,
   56:      module_script, beam_script, archive_script, epp,
   57:      create_and_extract, foldl, overflow,
   58:      archive_script_file_access, unicode, bad_io_server,
   59:      bypass_unicode_conversion].
   60: 
   61: groups() ->
   62:     [].
   63: 
   64: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72: 
   73: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   80:     ok.
   81: 
   82: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   83: 
   84: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   85:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   86:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
   87:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial 5",
   88: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
   89:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile 10",
   90: 	<<"factorial 10 = 3628800\nExitCode:0">>),
   91:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile_main 7",
   92: 	<<"factorial 7 = 5040\nExitCode:0">>),
   93:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_warning 20",
   94:         [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
   95:                     "%   12| bar() ->\n"
   96:                     "%     | ^\n\n"
   97:                     "factorial 20 = 2432902008176640000\n"
   98:                     "ExitCode:0">>]),
   99:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-i", "factorial_warning 20",
  100:                   [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
  101:                               "factorial 20 = 2432902008176640000\nExitCode:0">>]),
  102:     Warnings = [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
  103:                            "%   12| bar() ->\n"
  104:                            "%     | ^\n\n"
  105:                            "ExitCode:0">>],
  106:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  107:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s -i", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  108:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-c -s", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  109:     run(Config, Dir, "filesize "++filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),"filesize"),
  110: 	[data_dir,<<"filesize:11:1: Warning: function id/1 is unused\n"
  111:                     "%   11| id(I) -> I.\n"
  112:                     "%     | ^\n"
  113:                     "\n"
  114:                     "324\n"
  115:                     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  116:     run(Config, Dir, "test_script_name",
  117: 	[data_dir,<<"test_script_name\nExitCode:0">>]),
  118:     run(Config, Dir, "tail_rec 1000",
  119: 	[<<"ok\nExitCode:0">>]),
  120: 
  121:     %% We expect the trap_exit flag for the process to be false,
  122:     %% since that is the default state for newly spawned processes.
  123:     run(Config, Dir, "trap_exit",
  124: 	<<"false\nExitCode:0">>),
  125:     ok.
  126: 
  127: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  128: 
  129: errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  131:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  132:     run(Config, Dir, "compile_error",
  133: 	[data_dir,<<"compile_error:5:12: syntax error before: '*'\n">>,
  134: 	 data_dir,<<"compile_error:8:9: syntax error before: blarf\n">>,
  135: 	 <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  136:     CompileErrors = [data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n"
  137:                                 "%    6| main(Args) ->\n"
  138:                                 "%     | ^\n\n">>,
  139:                      data_dir,("lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n"
  140:                                "%    8|     halt(ExitCode).\n"
  141:                                "%     |          ^\n\n"),
  142:                      <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>],
  143:     run(Config, Dir, "lint_error", CompileErrors),
  144:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-i", "lint_error",
  145:                   [data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n">>,
  146:                    data_dir,"lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n",
  147:                    <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  148:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "lint_error", CompileErrors),
  149:     ok.
  150: 
  151: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  152: 
  153: strange_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  154:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  155:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  156:     run(Config, Dir, "strange.name -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  157: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  158: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  159:     ok.
  160: 
  161: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  162: 
  163: emulator_flags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  165:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  166:     run(Config, Dir, "emulator_flags -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  167: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  168: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  169: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  170: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  171: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  172: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  173:     ok.
  174: 
  175: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  176: 
  177: two_lines(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  178:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  179:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  180:     run(Config, Dir, "two_lines -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  181: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  182: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  183: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  184: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  185:     ok.
  186: 
  187: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  188: 
  189: emulator_flags_no_shebang(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  190:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  191:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  192:     %% Need run_with_opts, to always use "escript" explicitly
  193:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", "emulator_flags_no_shebang -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  194: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  195: 		     "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  196: 		     "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  197: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  198: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  199: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  203: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script
  204: %% Generate a new escript with a module header
  205: 
  206: module_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  207:     %% Read orig file
  208:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  209:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  210:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  211:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  212:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  213: 
  214:     %% Write source file
  215:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  216:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  217:     Base = "module_script",
  218:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  219:     ErlCode = ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  220: 	       "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  221: 	       string:join(Source, "\n"),
  222: 	       "\n"],
  223:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  224: 
  225: %%%%%%%
  226:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  227: 
  228:     %% With shebang
  229:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  230:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  231:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  232: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  233: 			  ErlCode]),
  234:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  235: 
  236:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  237: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  238: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  239: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  240: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  241: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  242: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  243: 
  244:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  245: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  246: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  247: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  248: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  249: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  250: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  251: 
  252:     %% Without shebang
  253:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  254:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  255:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  256: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  257: 			  ErlCode]),
  258:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  259: 
  260:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  261: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  262: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  263: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  264: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  265: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  266: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  267: 
  268:     %% Plain module without header
  269:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  270:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  271:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [ErlCode]),
  272:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  273: 
  274:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  275: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  276: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  277: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  278: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  279: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  280: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  281: 
  282: %%%%%%%
  283:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  284: 
  285:     %% With shebang
  286:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args_with_shebang",
  287:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  288:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  289: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  290: 			  Mode, "\n",
  291: 			  Flags, "\n",
  292: 			  ErlCode]),
  293:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  294: 
  295:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  296: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  297: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  298: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  299: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  300: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  301: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  302: 
  303:     ok.
  304: 
  305: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  306: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script and compile it.
  307: %% Generate a new escript containing the beam code and the escript header
  308: beam_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  309:     %% Read orig file
  310:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  311:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  312:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  313:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  314:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  315: 
  316:     %% Write source file
  317:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  318:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  319:     Base = "beam_script",
  320:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  321:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile,
  322: 			 ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  323: 			  "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  324: 			  string:join(Source, "\n"),
  325: 			  "\n"]),
  326: 
  327:     %% Compile the code
  328:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} = compile:file(ErlFile, [binary]),
  329: 
  330: %%%%%%%
  331:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  332: 
  333:     %% With shebang
  334:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  335:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  336:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  337: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  338: 			  BeamCode]),
  339:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  340: 
  341:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  342: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  343: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  344: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  345: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  346: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  347: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  348: 
  349:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  350: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  351: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  352: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  353: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  354: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  355: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  356: 
  357:     %% Without shebang
  358:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  359:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  360:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  361: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  362: 			  BeamCode]),
  363:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  364: 
  365:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  366: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  367: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  368: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  369: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  370: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  371: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  372: 
  373:     %% Plain beam file without header
  374:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  375:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  376:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [BeamCode]),
  377:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  378: 
  379:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  380: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  381: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  382: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  383: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  384: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  385: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  386: 
  387: %%%%%%%
  388:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  389: 
  390:     %% With shebang
  391:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args",
  392:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  393:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  394: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  395: 			  Mode, "\n",
  396: 			  Flags, "\n",
  397: 			  BeamCode]),
  398:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  399: 
  400:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  401: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  402: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  403: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  404: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  405: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  406: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  407:     ok.
  408: 
  409: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  410: %% Create an archive file containing two entire applications plus two
  411: %% alternate main modules. Generate a new escript containing the archive
  412: %% (with .app and .beam files and) and the escript header.
  413: 
  414: archive_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  415:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir
  416:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  417:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  418:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script.zip"]),
  419:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script"],
  420: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  421:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  422:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script"]),
  423: 
  424:     %% Compile the code
  425:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dict"),
  426:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dummy"),
  427:     {ok, MainFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  428:     ok = compile_files(MainFiles, TopDir, TopDir),
  429: 
  430:     %% Create the archive
  431:     {ok, TopFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  432:     {ok, {_, ArchiveBin}} = zip:create(Archive, TopFiles,
  433: 				       [memory, {compress, []}, {cwd, TopDir}]),
  434: 
  435:     %% Read the source script
  436:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir, "emulator_flags"]),
  437:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  438:     [Shebang, Mode, _Flags | _Source] =
  439: 	string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  440:     Flags = "%%! -archive_script_dict foo bar"
  441: 	" -archive_script_dict foo"
  442: 	" -archive_script_dummy bar",
  443:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  444: 
  445: %%%%%%%
  446:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  447:     MainBase = "archive_script_main",
  448:     MainScript = filename:join([PrivDir, MainBase]),
  449: 
  450:     %% With shebang
  451:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  452: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  453: 			  Flags, "\n",
  454: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  455:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  456: 
  457:     run(Config, PrivDir, MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  458: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  459: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  460: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  461: 	   "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  462: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  463: 
  464:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  465: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  466: 		     "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  467: 		     "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  468: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  469: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  470: 
  471:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_with_shebang"),
  472: 
  473:     %% Without shebang (no flags)
  474:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  475: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  476: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  477:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  478: 
  479:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  480: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  481: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  482: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  483: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  484: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  485:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_shebang"),
  486: 
  487:     %% Plain archive without header (no flags)
  488: 
  489:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript, [ArchiveBin]),
  490:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  491: 
  492:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  493: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  494: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  495: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  496: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  497: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  498:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_header"),
  499: 
  500: %%%%%%%
  501:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  502:     AltBase = "archive_script_alternate_main",
  503:     AltScript = filename:join([PrivDir, AltBase]),
  504:     ok = file:write_file(AltScript,
  505: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  506: 			  Mode, "\n",
  507: 			  Flags, " -escript main archive_script_main2\n",
  508: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  509:     ok = file:write_file_info(AltScript, OrigFI),
  510: 
  511:     run(Config, PrivDir, AltBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  512: 	[<<"main2:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  513: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  514: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  515: 	   "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  516: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  517: 
  518:     ok.
  519: 
  520: %% Test the correction of OTP-10071
  521: %% The errors identified are
  522: %%
  523: %% a) If primary archive was named "xxx", then a file in the same
  524: %%    directory named "xxxyyy" would be interpreted as a file named yyy
  525: %%    inside the archive.
  526: %%
  527: %% b) erl_prim_loader did not correctly create and normalize absolute
  528: %%    paths for primary archive and files inside it, so unless given
  529: %%    with exact same path files inside the archive would not be
  530: %%    found. E.g. if escript was started as ./xxx then "xxx/file"
  531: %%    would not be found since erl_prim_loader would try to match
  532: %%    /full/path/to/xxx with /full/path/to/./xxx. Same problem with
  533: %%    ../. Also, the use of symlinks in the path to the archive would
  534: %%    cause problems.
  535: %%
  536: %% c) Depending on how the primary archive was built,
  537: %%    erl_prim_loader:list_dir/1 would sometimes return an empty string
  538: %%    inside the file list. This was a virtual element representing the
  539: %%    top directory of the archive. This shall not occur.
  540: %%
  541: archive_script_file_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  542:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir
  543:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  544:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  545: 
  546:     MainMod = "archive_script_file_access",
  547:     MainSrc = MainMod ++ ".erl",
  548:     MainBeam = MainMod ++ ".beam",
  549: 
  550:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script_file_access.zip"]),
  551:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script_file_access"],
  552: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  553:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  554:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script_file_access"]),
  555: 
  556:     %% Compile the code
  557:     ok = compile_files([MainSrc], TopDir, TopDir),
  558: 
  559:     %% First, create a file structure which will be included in the archive:
  560:     %%
  561:     %% dir1/
  562:     %% dir1/subdir1/
  563:     %% dir1/subdir1/file1
  564:     %%
  565:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  566:     ok = file:set_cwd(TopDir),
  567:     DummyDir = "dir1",
  568:     DummySubDir = filename:join(DummyDir, "subdir1"),
  569:     RelDummyFile = filename:join(DummySubDir, "file1"),
  570:     DummyFile = filename:join(TopDir,RelDummyFile),
  571:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(DummyFile),
  572:     ok = file:write_file(DummyFile, ["foo\nbar\nbaz"]),
  573: 
  574:     %% 1. Create zip archive by adding the dummy file and the beam
  575:     %%    file as binaries to zip.
  576:     %%
  577:     %% This used to provoke the following issues when the script was run as
  578:     %% "./<script_name>":
  579:     %% a. erl_prim_loader:read_file_info/1 returning 'error'
  580:     %% b. erl_prim_loader:list_dir/1 returning {ok, ["dir1", [], "file1"]}
  581:     %%    leading to an infinite loop in reltool_target:spec_dir/1
  582:     Files1 =
  583: 	lists:map(fun(Filename) ->
  584: 			  {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(Filename),
  585: 			  {Filename,Bin}
  586: 		  end,
  587: 		  [RelDummyFile,MainBeam]),
  588:     {ok, {"mem", Bin1}} = zip:create("mem", Files1, [memory]),
  589: 
  590:     %% Create the escript
  591:     ScriptName1 = "archive_script_file_access1",
  592:     Script1 = filename:join([PrivDir, ScriptName1]),
  593:     Flags = "-escript main " ++ MainMod,
  594:     ok = escript:create(Script1,[shebang,{emu_args,Flags},{archive,Bin1}]),
  595:     ok = file:change_mode(Script1,8#00744),
  596: 
  597:     %% If supported, create a symlink to the script. This is used to
  598:     %% test error b) described above this test case.
  599:     SymlinkName1 = "symlink_to_"++ScriptName1,
  600:     Symlink1 = filename:join([PrivDir, SymlinkName1]),
  601:     file:make_symlink(ScriptName1,Symlink1), % will fail if not supported
  602: 
  603:     %% Also add a dummy file in the same directory with the same name
  604:     %% as the script except is also has an extension. This used to
  605:     %% test error a) described above this test case.
  606:     ok = file:write_file(Script1 ++ ".extension",
  607: 			 <<"same name as script, but with extension">>),
  608: 
  609:     %% Change to script's directory and run it as "./<script_name>"
  610:     ok = file:set_cwd(PrivDir),
  611:     run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ ScriptName1 ++ " " ++ ScriptName1,
  612: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  613:     ok = file:set_cwd(TopDir),
  614: 
  615: 
  616:     %% 2. Create zip archive by letting zip read the files from the file system
  617:     %%
  618:     %% The difference compared to the archive_script_file_access1 is
  619:     %% that this will have a file element for each directory in the
  620:     %% archive - while archive_script_file_access1 will only have a
  621:     %% file element per regular file.
  622:     Files2 = [DummyDir,MainBeam],
  623:     {ok, {"mem", Bin2}} = zip:create("mem", Files2, [memory]),
  624: 
  625:     %% Create the escript
  626:     ScriptName2 = "archive_script_file_access2",
  627:     Script2 = filename:join([PrivDir, ScriptName2]),
  628:     ok = escript:create(Script2,[shebang,{emu_args,Flags},{archive,Bin2}]),
  629:     ok = file:change_mode(Script2,8#00744),
  630: 
  631:     %% Also add a dummy file in the same directory with the same name
  632:     %% as the script except is also has an extension. This used to
  633:     %% test error a) described above this test case.
  634:     ok = file:write_file(Script2 ++ ".extension",
  635: 			 <<"same name as script, but with extension">>),
  636: 
  637:     %% If supported, create a symlink to the script. This is used to
  638:     %% test error b) described above this test case.
  639:     SymlinkName2 = "symlink_to_"++ScriptName2,
  640:     Symlink2 = filename:join([PrivDir, SymlinkName2]),
  641:     file:make_symlink(ScriptName2,Symlink2), % will fail if not supported
  642: 
  643:     %% Change to script's directory and run it as "./<script_name>"
  644:     ok = file:set_cwd(PrivDir),
  645:     run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ ScriptName2 ++ " " ++ ScriptName2,
  646: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  647: 
  648:     %% 3. If symlinks are supported, run one of the scripts via a symlink.
  649:     %%
  650:     %% This is in order to test error b) described above this test case.
  651:     case element(1,os:type()) =:= win32 orelse file:read_link(Symlink2) of
  652: 	{ok,_} ->
  653: 	    run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ SymlinkName2 ++ " " ++ ScriptName2,
  654: 		[<<"ExitCode:0">>]);
  655: 	_ -> % not supported
  656: 	    ok
  657:     end,
  658:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir).
  659: 
  660: 
  661: compile_app(TopDir, AppName) ->
  662:     AppDir = filename:join([TopDir, AppName]),
  663:     SrcDir = filename:join([AppDir, "src"]),
  664:     OutDir = filename:join([AppDir, "ebin"]),
  665:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(SrcDir),
  666:     compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir).
  667: 
  668: compile_files([File | Files], SrcDir, OutDir) ->
  669:     case filename:extension(File) of
  670: 	".erl" ->
  671: 	    AbsFile = filename:join([SrcDir, File]),
  672: 	    case compile:file(AbsFile, [{outdir, OutDir},report_errors]) of
  673: 		{ok, _Mod} ->
  674: 		    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir);
  675: 		Error ->
  676: 		    {compilation_error, AbsFile, OutDir, Error}
  677: 	    end;
  678: 	_ ->
  679: 	    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir)
  680:     end;
  681: compile_files([], _, _) ->
  682:     ok.
  683: 
  684: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  685: 
  686: epp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  687:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  688:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  689:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_epp 5",
  690: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
  691:     ok.
  692: 
  693: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  694: 
  695: create_and_extract(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  696:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  697:      EmuArg, Source,
  698:      _ErlBase, ErlCode,
  699:      _BeamBase, BeamCode,
  700:      ArchiveBin} =
  701: 	prepare_creation("create_and_extract", Config),
  702: 
  703:     Bodies =
  704: 	[[{source, ErlCode}],
  705: 	 [{beam, BeamCode}],
  706: 	 [{archive, ArchiveBin}]],
  707: 
  708:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts with shebangs
  709:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  710: 	S <- [[{shebang, default}],
  711: 	      [{shebang, "/usr/bin/env     escript"}]],
  712: 	C <- [[],
  713: 	      [{comment, undefined}],
  714: 	      [{comment, default}],
  715: 	      [{comment, "This is a nonsense comment"}]],
  716: 	E <- [[],
  717: 	      [{emu_args, undefined}],
  718: 	      [{emu_args, EmuArg}]],
  719: 	B <- [[{source, Source}] | Bodies]],
  720: 
  721:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts without shebangs
  722:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  723: 	S <- [[], [{shebang, undefined}]],
  724: 	C <- [[], [{comment, undefined}]],
  725: 	E <- [[], [{emu_args, undefined}]],
  726: 	B <- Bodies],
  727: 
  728:     %% Verify the compile_source option
  729:     file:delete(NewFile),
  730:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{source, Source}]),
  731:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, Source}]} = escript:extract(NewFile, []),
  732:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, BeamCode2}]} =
  733: 	escript:extract(NewFile, [compile_source]),
  734:     verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo,
  735: 		    [{shebang, default},
  736: 		     {comment, default},
  737: 		     {beam, BeamCode2}]),
  738: 
  739:     file:delete(NewFile),
  740:     ok.
  741: 
  742: prepare_creation(Base, Config) ->
  743:     %% Read the source
  744:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  745:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  746:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir,"emulator_flags"]),
  747:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  748:     NewFile = filename:join([PrivDir, Base]),
  749:     {ok, [{shebang, default},
  750: 	  {comment, _},
  751: 	  {emu_args, EmuArg},
  752: 	  {source, Source}]} =
  753: 	escript:extract(OrigFile, []),
  754: 
  755:     %% Compile the code
  756:     ErlFile = NewFile ++ ".erl",
  757:     ErlCode = list_to_binary(["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  758: 			      "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  759: 			      Source, "\n\n"]),
  760:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  761: 
  762:     %% Compile the code
  763:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} =
  764: 	compile:file(ErlFile, [binary, debug_info]),
  765: 
  766:     %% Create an archive
  767:     {ok, {_, ArchiveBin}} =
  768: 	zip:create("dummy_archive_name",
  769: 		   [{Base ++ ".erl", ErlCode},
  770: 		    {Base ++ ".beam", BeamCode}],
  771: 		   [{compress, []}, memory]),
  772:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  773:      EmuArg, Source,
  774:      Base ++ ".erl", ErlCode,
  775:      Base ++ ".beam", BeamCode,
  776:      ArchiveBin}.
  777: 
  778: verify_sections(Config, File, FileInfo, Sections) ->
  779:     io:format("~p:verify_sections(\n\t~p,\n\t~p,\n\t~p).\n",
  780: 	      [?MODULE, File, FileInfo, Sections]),
  781: 
  782:     %% Create
  783:     file:delete(File),
  784:     ok = escript:create(File, Sections),
  785:     ok = file:write_file_info(File, FileInfo),
  786: 
  787:     %% Run
  788:     Dir = filename:absname(filename:dirname(File)),
  789:     Base = filename:basename(File),
  790: 
  791:     HasArg = fun(Tag) ->
  792: 		     case lists:keysearch(Tag, 1, Sections) of
  793: 			 false -> false;
  794: 			 {value, {_, undefined}} -> false;
  795: 			 {value, _} -> true
  796: 		     end
  797: 	     end,
  798:     ExpectedMain = <<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n">>,
  799:     ExpectedOutput =
  800: 	case HasArg(emu_args) of
  801: 	    true ->
  802: 		<<"nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  803: 		  "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  804: 		  "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  805: 		  "unknown:[]\n"
  806: 		  "ExitCode:0">>;
  807: 	    false ->
  808: 		<<"nostick:[]\nmnesia:[]\nERL_FLAGS=false\nunknown:[]\nExitCode:0">>
  809: 	end,
  810: 
  811:     InputArgs = Base ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  812:     Expected = <<ExpectedMain/binary, ExpectedOutput/binary>>,
  813:     case HasArg(shebang) of
  814: 	true ->
  815: 	    run(Config, Dir, InputArgs, [Expected]);
  816: 	false ->
  817: 	    run_with_opts(Config, Dir, [], InputArgs, [Expected])
  818:     end,
  819: 
  820:     %% Verify
  821:     {ok, Bin} = escript:create(binary, Sections),
  822:     {ok, Read} = file:read_file(File),
  823:     Bin = Read, % Assert
  824: 
  825:     Normalized = normalize_sections(Sections),
  826:     {ok, Extracted} = escript:extract(File, []),
  827:     io:format("Normalized; ~p\n", [Normalized]),
  828:     io:format("Extracted ; ~p\n", [Extracted]),
  829:     Normalized = Extracted, % Assert
  830:     ok.
  831: 
  832: normalize_sections(Sections) ->
  833:     AtomToTuple =
  834: 	fun(Val) ->
  835: 		if
  836: 		    is_atom(Val) -> {Val, default};
  837: 		    true -> Val
  838: 		end
  839: 	end,
  840:     case lists:map(AtomToTuple, [{K, V} || {K, V} <- Sections, V =/= undefined]) of
  841: 	[{shebang, Shebang} | Rest] ->
  842: 	    [{shebang, Shebang} |
  843: 	     case Rest of
  844: 		 [{comment, Comment} | Rest2] ->
  845: 		     [{comment, Comment} |
  846: 		      case Rest2 of
  847: 			  [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body] ->
  848: 			      [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body];
  849: 			  [Body] ->
  850: 			      [{emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  851: 		      end
  852: 		     ];
  853: 		 [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body] ->
  854: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body];
  855: 		 [Body] ->
  856: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  857: 	     end
  858: 	    ];
  859: 	[Body] ->
  860: 	    [{shebang, undefined}, {comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  861:     end.
  862: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  863: 
  864: 
  865: 
  866: foldl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  867:     {NewFile, _FileInfo,
  868:      _EmuArg, _Source,
  869:      ErlBase, ErlCode,
  870:      BeamBase, _BeamCode,
  871:      ArchiveBin} =
  872: 	prepare_creation("foldl", Config),
  873: 
  874:     Collect = fun(Name, GetInfo, GetBin, Acc) ->
  875: 		      [{Name, GetInfo(), GetBin()} | Acc]
  876: 	      end,
  877: 
  878:     %% Get line numbers and the file attribute right
  879:     SourceFile = NewFile ++ ".erl",
  880:     <<_:1/binary, ErlCode2/binary>> = ErlCode,
  881:     ok = file:write_file(SourceFile, ErlCode2),
  882:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} =
  883: 	compile:file(SourceFile, [binary, debug_info]),
  884: 
  885:     %% Verify source script
  886:     ok = escript:create(SourceFile, [{source, ErlCode}]),
  887:     {ok, [{".", _, BeamCode2}]}
  888: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], SourceFile),
  889: 
  890:     {ok, Abstr} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCode, [abstract_code]),
  891:     {ok, Abstr2} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCode2, [abstract_code]),
  892:     %% io:format("abstr1=~p\n", [Abstr]),
  893:     %% io:format("abstr2=~p\n", [Abstr2]),
  894:     Abstr = Abstr2, % Assert
  895: 
  896:     %% Verify beam script
  897:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{beam, BeamCode}]),
  898:     {ok, [{".", _, BeamCode}]}
  899: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  900: 
  901:     %% Verify archive scripts
  902:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{archive, ArchiveBin}]),
  903:     {ok, [{BeamBase, #file_info{}, _},
  904: 	  {ErlBase, #file_info{}, _}]}
  905: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  906: 
  907:     ArchiveFiles = [{ErlBase, ErlCode}, {BeamBase, BeamCode}],
  908:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{archive, ArchiveFiles, []}]),
  909:     {ok, [{BeamBase, _, _},
  910: 	  {ErlBase, _, _}]}
  911: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  912: 
  913:     ok.
  914: 
  915: escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  916:     code:ensure_loaded(zip),
  917:     case erlang:function_exported(zip, foldl, 3) of
  918: 	true ->
  919: 	    emulate_escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File);
  920: 	false ->
  921: 	    escript:foldl(Fun, Acc, File)
  922:     end.
  923: 
  924: emulate_escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  925:     case escript:extract(File, [compile_source]) of
  926: 	{ok, [_Shebang, _Comment, _EmuArgs, Body]} ->
  927: 	    case Body of
  928: 		{source, BeamCode} ->
  929: 		    GetInfo = fun() -> file:read_file_info(File) end,
  930: 		    GetBin = fun() -> BeamCode end,
  931: 		    {ok, Fun(".", GetInfo, GetBin, Acc)};
  932: 		{beam, BeamCode} ->
  933: 		    GetInfo = fun() -> file:read_file_info(File) end,
  934: 		    GetBin = fun() -> BeamCode end,
  935: 		    {ok, Fun(".", GetInfo, GetBin, Acc)};
  936: 		{archive, ArchiveBin} ->
  937: 		    zip:foldl(Fun, Acc, {File, ArchiveBin})
  938: 	    end;
  939: 	{error, Reason} ->
  940: 	    {error, Reason}
  941:     end.
  942: 
  943: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  944:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  945:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  946:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode1",
  947:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  948:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  949:            "called as <<224,170,170>> / <<224,170,170>>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  950:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode2",
  951:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  952:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  953:            "called as <<\"\xaa\">> / <<\"\xaa\">>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  954:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode3", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  955:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode4", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  956:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode5", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  957:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode6", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  958:     ok.
  959: 
  960: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  961: 
  962: overflow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  963:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  964:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  965:     run(Config, Dir, "arg_overflow",
  966: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  967:     run(Config, Dir, "linebuf_overflow",
  968: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  969:     ok.
  970: 
  971: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  972: 
  973: %% OTP-16006, ERL-992
  974: bad_io_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  975:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  976:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  977:     run(Config, Dir, "bad_io_server",
  978:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  979:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  980:            "called as '\\x{400}' / 0\nExitCode:127">>]),
  981:     ok.
  982: 
  983: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  984: 
  985: bypass_unicode_conversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  986:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  987:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  988:     Cmd = fun(Enc) -> "bypass_unicode_conversion "++atom_to_list(Enc)++" 1> /dev/null" end,
  989:     {TimeLatin1, _} = timer:tc(
  990:         fun() -> run(Config, Dir, Cmd(latin1), [<<"ExitCode:0">>]) end),
  991:     {TimeUnicode, _} = timer:tc(
  992:         fun() -> run(Config, Dir, Cmd(unicode), [<<"ExitCode:0">>]) end),
  993:     %% Check that Time(latin1) is about the same as Time(unicode) with a maximum 10% difference
  994:     %% Without the bypass, the time difference would be about 5x.
  995:     io:format("Time(latin1) = ~p ~~= Time(unicode) = ~p~n", [TimeLatin1, TimeUnicode]),
  996:     true = TimeLatin1 =< TimeUnicode * 1.1,
  997:     ok.
  998: 
  999: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1000: 
 1001: run(Config, Dir, Cmd, Expected) ->
 1002:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", Cmd, Expected).
 1003: 
 1004: run_with_opts(Config, Dir, Opts, Cmd0, Expected) ->
 1005:     [CmdName | _] = string:split(Cmd0, " ", all),
 1006:     Cmd = case os:type() of
 1007: 	      {win32,Wtype} ->
 1008:                   %% This case is stolen from os:mk_cmd/2
 1009:                   Command = case {os:getenv("COMSPEC"),Wtype} of
 1010:                                 {false,windows} -> "command.com /c ";
 1011:                                 {false,_} -> "cmd /c ";
 1012:                                 {Cspec,_} -> lists:concat([Cspec," /c "])
 1013:                             end,
 1014:                   Command ++ "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ filename:nativename(Dir) ++ "\\" ++ Cmd0;
 1015: 	      _ -> "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ Dir ++ "/" ++ Cmd0
 1016: 	  end,
 1017:     do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd, Expected).
 1018: 
 1019: do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd0, Expected0) ->
 1020:     StdErrFile = tempnam(Config, CmdName),
 1021:     Cmd = Cmd0 ++ " 2> " ++ filename:nativename(StdErrFile),
 1022:     io:format("Run: ~p\n", [Cmd]),
 1023:     Expected = iolist_to_binary(expected_output(Expected0, Dir)),
 1024: 
 1025:     Env = [{"PATH",Dir++":"++os:getenv("PATH")},
 1026:            {"ERL_FLAGS",false},{"ERL_AFLAGS",false}],
 1027:     Port = open_port({spawn,Cmd}, [exit_status,eof,in,{env,Env},hide]),
 1028:     StdOut = get_data(Port, []),
 1029:     receive
 1030: 	{Port,{exit_status,ExitCode}} ->
 1031: 	    {ok, StdErr} = file:read_file(StdErrFile),
 1032: 	    file:delete(StdErrFile),
 1033: 	    Res = [StdErr, StdOut],
 1034: 	    Actual = iolist_to_binary([Res,"ExitCode:"++integer_to_list(ExitCode)]),
 1035: 	    case matches(Expected, Actual) of
 1036: 		true ->
 1037: 		    ok;
 1038: 		false ->
 1039: 		    io:format("Expected: ~p\n", [Expected]),
 1040: 		    io:format("Actual:   ~p\n", [Actual]),
 1041: 		    ct:fail(failed)
 1042: 	    end
 1043:     end.
 1044: 
 1045: %% Check if Expected and Actual contain the same lines.
 1046: %% The lines may occur in different order.
 1047: matches(Expected, Actual) ->
 1048:     ExpectedLines = string:split(Expected, "\n", all),
 1049:     ActualLines = string:split(Actual, "\n", all),
 1050:     matches_1(ExpectedLines, ActualLines).
 1051: 
 1052: matches_1([], []) -> true;
 1053: matches_1([Line | Expected], Actual0) ->
 1054:     case delete_first(Line, Actual0) of
 1055: 	false -> false;
 1056: 	Actual -> matches_1(Expected, Actual)
 1057:     end.
 1058: 
 1059: delete_first(X, L) -> delete_first(X, L, []).
 1060: 
 1061: delete_first(_X, [], _Acc) -> false;
 1062: delete_first(X, [X | Tail], Acc) -> lists:reverse(Acc, Tail);
 1063: delete_first(X, [Y | Tail], Acc) -> delete_first(X, Tail, [Y | Acc]).
 1064: 
 1065: tempnam(Config, Prefix) ->
 1066:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1067:     File = filename:join(Dir, Prefix ++ ".stderr"),
 1068:     case file:delete(File) of
 1069: 	ok -> ok;
 1070: 	{error, enoent} -> ok
 1071:     end,
 1072:     case file:open(File, [write, exclusive, raw]) of
 1073: 	{ok, IoDev} ->
 1074: 	    ok = file:close(IoDev),
 1075: 	    ok = file:delete(File),
 1076: 	    File;
 1077: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1078: 	    io:format("Failed to create ~s: ~p\n", [File, Reason]),
 1079: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1080:     end.
 1081: 
 1082: get_data(Port, SoFar) ->
 1083:     receive
 1084: 	{Port,{data,Bytes}} ->
 1085: 	    get_data(Port, [SoFar|Bytes]);
 1086: 	{Port,eof} ->
 1087: 	    erlang:port_close(Port),
 1088: 	    SoFar
 1089:     end.
 1090: 
 1091: expected_output([data_dir|T], Data) ->
 1092:     Slash = case os:type() of
 1093: 		{win32,_} -> "\\";
 1094: 		_ -> "/"
 1095: 	    end,
 1096:     [filename:nativename(Data)++Slash|expected_output(T, Data)];
 1097: expected_output([H|T], Data) ->
 1098:     [H|expected_output(T, Data)];
 1099: expected_output([], _) ->
 1100:     [];
 1101: expected_output(Bin, _) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1102:     Bin.
 1103:
